name: Jessy Rabon
text: Well I don‚Äôt really order from Pizza Hut very often. But I decided I‚Äôd use a 23.99 coupon that feeds 4 people. Well they didn‚Äôt honer there coupon. Tried to charge $29 and change. And wouldn‚Äôt honer the coupon and I ordered just as ‚Ä¶More

name: Micki Hendrix
text: It warm still good and warm. Driver was v amazing. And very nice.

name: Sara S.Bolden
text: This place is fantastic! Affordable pricing, large dishes and the staff are regularly very nice.

name: Elayne Linder
text: Very fast and the girl that works there is very friendly and helpful. I thought when they put this Pizza Hut there it would be a hassle to get in and out but it isn't.

name: L. E. Smith
text: From the young lady who took my order to the delivery guy or cashier the store I've had consistently stellar service. My pizzas are already correct, hot, and tasty!

name: Highlady28
text: Absolutely awful. No one asked for this to come back after God did us the favor of burning down the old one. Take a hint. Call 2Bros, Papa John's or Pizza and then Some in Easley for pizza. Grease bread and frozen dough. Support family owned buisness.

name: Emily Oldson
text: Really fresh pizza and staff was really nice during my curbside pickup!

name: Lori Mckinney
text: The pizza wasn‚Äôt hot enough to even melt the cheese on top.  The wings had a dab of sauce on the bottom of the bowl and the Cinnabon was stale.  Will never order from here again!!!

name: Paul Gawel
text: The manager found that they did not make our pizza correct and told us instead of us getting home to find out they made it wrong. I give them credit for telling the truth and making it right.

name: Sandra Collins
text: The delivery driver was not wearing a mask or gloves but the pizza was good.

name: Sandra Hayes
text: So happy Pizza Hut is back in Easley although their probably tired of seeing me there üòÅ

name: M Dawson
text: Overcooked pizza and cheese sticks, not worth the price compared to other local joints that offer much higher quality.

name: Andrey sebastian Quintero
text: (Translated by Google) The place is well located a little badly and with the coronavirus they have not yet managed to order well the orders take a little longer than before but they still have the same quality ‚Ä¶More
